*paragraphs (Cited Artifact Part Type#paragraphs)We recommend evaluating the following preoperative risk factors for POD: (1) Older age (2) American Society of Anesthesiology Physical status score > 2 (3) Charlson Comorbidity Index ≥ 2 (4) Mini Mental State Examination score < 25 points

part.value:
We recommend evaluating the following preoperative risk factors for POD:
        (1) Older age
        (2) American Society of Anesthesiology Physical status score > 2
        (3) Charlson Comorbidity Index ≥ 2
        (4) Mini Mental State Examination score < 25 points
